<<<<<<< HEAD
Judicial astrologers totally routed, and their pretence to Scripture, reason & experience briefly, yet clearly and fully answered, or, A brief discourse, wherein is clearly manifested that divining by the stars hath no solid foundation ... published by J.A. for publick good. Allen, John, 17th cent.
[6], 28, [2] p.
Printed for John Allen ..., [London] : 1659.
Attributed to John Allen. Cf. BM. "Bookseller to the reader" signed by the author. Place of publication from BM. Advertisements: p. [6] at beginning and p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
=======

[6], 28, [2] p.
Printed for John Allen ..., [London] : 1659.
Attributed to John Allen. Cf. BM. "Bookseller to the reader" signed by the author. Place of publication from BM. Advertisements: p. [6] at beginning and p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
